casebody.data:
Michael Teitle et al v. The Automobile Insurance Company of Hartford, Conn. (73 A2d 305)

February Term, 1950.

Present: Sherburne, C. J., Jeffords, Cleary, Adams and Blackmer, JJ. Opinion filed May 2, 1950. Witters & Longmoore and Clarence V. Akley for the plaintiffs. Arthur L. Graves and Frederick G. Mehlman for the defendant. *236Jeffords, J.

The issues in this cause are identical with those in Teitle v. The London and Lancashire Insurance Co., ante page 228, 73 A2d 300. For the reasons given in that opinion the same entry-must be made.

The judgment amended as per stipulation on file is affirmed.
